ModMetaData.name: Leeani Playable Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by MikeRobe https://github.com/quicksilverfox/RimworldMods/releases/latest https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542414306 If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
Replaced old fermenter code with [SYR] Processor Framework ... not a hard requirement, but you won't have the cider and wine production buildings without it.
--
Original mod notes (1.2):
A nice happy race of people-foxes. Alien Race Framework required, load after it. Built-in support for EPOE.
Relationships incompatible with Psychology - not my fault, can't fix on my end.
Adds Faction, starting Scenario, playable Race, Throne, Quarterstaff and Bycocket (Robin Hood Hats).
Plenty of backstories, as well as names. Suggestions? Find @MikeRobe on the Rimworld Discord.
